name: ChartXL Chart
summary: Learn about .HCX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Chart XL is supported for Windows 95, 98, ME, NT 4.0, 2000, and XP single-mode platforms. However, Harvard Graphics ChartXL is discontinued and no longer available to purchase.

description: 2D or 3D chart generated by ChartXL, a Harvard Graphics data analysis and presentation application; stores data and display information; can be used for saving surface plots, line graphs, polar charts, XYZ bar graphs, Gantt charts, and other visualizations.
